message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product which I believe would be very valuable to you.  I'm asking for $14,000.  What do you think?
Alice, I appreciate your offer, but $14,000 is a bit more than I'm comfortable with.  I'm willing to pay $10,000 for the product.  Let's see if we can find common ground.
Bob, I understand your position, but $10,000 is too low for me.  How about we meet in the middle at $12,000? This is a fair price considering the value it will bring you.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $12,000 is still a bit high for me.  I'm willing to go up to $11,000.  Let's see if we can make this work.
